No. Unlike other upgrade sellers who sell invites from cracked family accs, my accs are completely owned and pre-paid by me. It will last a whole year.2. Are they shared or cracked?A. You can provide your existing one as long as it didn't join any family plan in the past 12 months. If it has, I suggest you create a new email and give me that.T.O.SAll sales are final. NO REFUNDSAll accounts come with lifetime warranty , if account dies before you , just contact me i will replace itChanging Password will void warrantyI go first for very trusted memberAccept All crypto currency and no paypal
